Dialogues.Text: Probably wasn't the best idea to stay up that late on a sunday. Especially with Cam staying over.

Dialogues.Speaker: MC
Dialogues.Text: Ah- crap. It's already past seven. I'm gonna miss the bus-

Dialogues.Speaker: MC
Dialogues.Text: The hell was that? Am I on something today? Am I still dreaming…?

Dialogues.Speaker: MC
Dialogues.Text: Oh- but that reminds me. I did need to set my clock an hour backwards-

Dialogues.Speaker: Cam
Dialogues.ThoughtWorldText: Would you shut that fucking thing up?

Dialogues.Speaker: Cam
Dialogues.Text: The hell was that? Am I on something today? Am I still dreaming…?

Dialogues.Speaker: Cam
Dialogues.Text: Good is right! Check out how sunny it is outside!
Dialogues.ThoughtWorldText: I really ought to get more sleep…

Dialogues.Speaker: Cam
Dialogues.Text: Come on, I made breakfast. They're scrambled today.
Dialogues.ThoughtWorldText: Can't you buy anything other than eggs…?

Dialogues.Speaker: Cam
Dialogues.Text: …So, I guess I can… read minds or something now? Maybe I'm just hallucinating. Wouldn't be the first time.

Dialogues.Speaker: Cam
Dialogues.Text: Whatever. I'll figure this out later. Maybe I can just sleep it off. For now I'll just try not to act like an insane person.
